actions-list.actionItem: The Speaker announced that the House do now adjourn pursuant to section 3(z) of H. Res. 5. The next meeting is scheduled for 1:00 p.m. on August 9, 2024.

The House received a message from the Deputy Clerk. Pursuant to the permission granted in Clause 2(h) of Rule II of the Rules of the U.S. House of Representatives, the Deputy Clerk notified the House that she had received the following message from the Secretary of the Senate on August 2, 2024, at 12:52 p.m.: That the Senate passed S. 211, S. 2781, S. 3938, S. 4199, S. 4235, S. 4367, and the Senate agreed to H. Con. Res. 120.
The Chair led the House in reciting the Pledge of Allegiance to the Flag.
Pursuant to section 3(z) of H. Res. 5, the Journal of the last day's proceedings was approved.
Today's prayer was offered by the House Chaplain, Chaplain Margaret Grun Kibben.
The Speaker designated the Honorable Alexander X. Mooney to act as Speaker pro tempore for today.
The House convened, starting a new legislative day.
